ru.maximkulikov.goodgame.api.auth.grants.implicit

Interface AuthenticationListener

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    AuthenticationCallbackServer

    public interface AuthenticationListener
    Interface for listening to twitch.tv authentication access tokens

      Called when a twitch.tv authentication access token has been received.
